section.name: Apache Turbine Project Board report, July 2007

subsection.name: Status
subsection.p: TLP migration is mostly done. The largest outstanding issue is to migrate our download pages over from Jakarta. Other than this development activity has been very low this month.

The most immediate challenge we have is addressing the requirement to register Turbine's cryptographic capabilities as per http://apache.org/dev/crypto (ECCN codes). This was mentioned on last month's report, but a query via the dev list has put pressure on us to action this.
We have no board-level issues at this time.

subsection.name: Community changes
subsection.p: No new committers were voted in since the last board report.
No new PMC members were voted in since the last board report.

subsection.name: Turbine core project
subsection.p: No major activity this month. Further work on localization is being discussed and the ECCN code issue mentioned above came up.
No beta or final releases were made since the last board report.

subsection.name: Fulcrum component project
subsection.p: No major activity this month. A minor build problem relating to the redirection from jakarta to turbine has been identified and will no doubt be fixed in less time than it has taken me to write this sentence.
No beta or final releases were made since the last board report.

subsection.name: META project
subsection.p: No beta or final releases were made since the last board report.
